basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/ExtraHop/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. Configure the ExtraHop Detection Data Connector to send ExtraHop detection data to the Microsoft Sentinel. An ExtraHop workbook and analytic rules available from the Microsoft Sentinel Workspace enable you to gain insight into detections and generate detection alerts. **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for ExtraHop. You can get ExtraHop custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.
This workbook provides immediate insight into detection data ingested from ExtraHop.
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.

options.text: This analytics rule will generate alerts in Microsoft Sentinel for detections from ExtraHop that are recommended for triage.
